# Software
- [R](https://www.r-project.org/) is a free and open-source programming language primarily used for statistics and data analysis.
- [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/) is a free and easy-to-use interface to program in R and other languages.
- [git](https://git-scm.com/) is an open-source version control system that allows you to keep traces of your changes and do reproducible research.
